title: Riot, when are we going to get merch for OTHER champs who don't have merch?
body:
https://na.merch.riotgames.com/media/catalog/product/r/i/riot_games-2017-08-16_star_guardian_ekko_worlds_tibbers_3708_copy.png

This will be Ekko's 5th piece of merch, including 3 T-shirts and a small figure and THAT is assuming I didn't over look something. Jinx has 2 figures and is getting a minifig in a Star Guardian set from what I read about soon.
 http://comicbook.com/gaming/2017/08/11/new-league-of-legends-star-guardian-figures-releasing-in-septemb/
 Lately the only champs who seem to be getting merch are eather: 
A) Reworked champs
B) Popular champs
C) Champs with big new skins

And god forbid if they fall under 2-3 of those categories, cause then they are likely to get multiple stuff in the merch store. Hell, the "reworked" thing is situational at best considering MOST of the reworked champs haven't actually gotten any merch. Only VGU champs that have gotten a figure to my knowledge are {{champion:78}} and {{champion:18}} ({{champion:41}} also has one, but it was from before his VGU). Where is the merch for champs like {{champion:62}}, {{champion:14}}, {{champion:82}}, {{champion:421}}, {{champion:3}} and {{champion:101}}? I WANT TO GIVE YOU MONEY RIOT, GIVE ME A REASON TO SPEND IT!
